item.description:
Herb Pearce continues to teach us about dating and relationships. Some of the topics that Herb will cover include:
  • Where to meet people
  • What to say when meeting people
  • How to pick up on non-verbal signals
  • How to ask for contact information
  • How to ask someone out
  • Where to go on and what to do on a date
  • What to share
  • Whether to kiss or not
  • Whether to continue or not
  • How to relate on the first few dates!


The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring and share our own food as long as there is not any meat in it. Due to the size of the studio, a RSVP limit has been set.

***** About Herb Pearce *****
Herb Pearce is a relationship coach of 30 years for couples, singles and families. His specialty is working with personality differences and ways to bridge differences and enhance relationships.

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Meeting, Dating and Relating
